misc: Known for bomb drives despite his advanced age.
Finally made his first hole-in-one on May 24th, 2025, after 20 years of trying.
biography: Harri, affectionately known in golfing circles as "the doctor," is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Hattula Golf with distinction. With five prior appearances and two Hector Trophée victories under his belt, Harri is set to make his sixth appearance in 2025.

Despite his advanced age, Harri is renowned for his prodigious drives, consistently bombing the ball down the fairway with remarkable power and precision. Off the course, Harri is a man of quiet determination and steely resolve, traits that have undoubtedly contributed to his success on the greens.

A testament to his unwavering dedication, Harri finally achieved a long-sought milestone on May 24th, 2025, recording his first-ever hole-in-one after two decades of relentless pursuit. His participation in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 is eagerly anticipated.
